title: Ghost
description: This is a story about a young girl who disappeared like a ghost. Abigail’s future wouldn’t start until the man who killed her parents paid for what he did.After Abigail turned seven, she didn’t exist anymore. Her life ended during a nightmare, when her parents were killed. Xander had finally found what he’d been looking for. But he didn’t know it till it was too late. Their love blossom and bloomed. They created a life together. What they didn’t know is they’d both been looking for each other for years, and their world as they knew it was going to come crashing down hard.
author: S. Cavanagh
